release_note: Added Introduced a browser extension for creating quick notes or clipping articles from web pages. Available for download from the Chrome Store or here https: monolognotes.com en chrome_extension after approval. Optimized Note template editing now utilizes a new editor Added the ability to create new notes with plain text from the clipboard Fixed Images added to notes from the clipboard or by drag drop are now correctly uploaded to the cloud. New notes now correctly create review reminders. Fixed an issue where clicking on bidirectional links at the bottom of notes focused incorrectly Fixed the issue where the second column layout did not display in split screen mode Fixed incorrect escaping when converting to Markdown

Optimized New note saving mechanism New triple column view on iPad and Mac Added Editor now supports task lists and tables Fixed Fixed an issue with exporting notes as images Fixed an occasional freeze on app launch
Added New notes list page with added functionalities like multi selection sorting filtering and swipe actions. Search optimization New user tutorial Fixed Some issues causing crashes
Fixed Fixed a few bugs
Fixed Fixed a few bugs
Fixed Fixed an issue where tags could not be created on some os versions

New version alert! Elevate your writing experience: 1. Introducing our WYSIWYG Markdown editor. See format changes as you type without needing a separate preview. Supports all common Markdown elements like headings lists and more. 2. View backlinks and smart backlinks directly below your notes no longer tucked away in the sidebar. 3. More control over your backlinks! Customize their display titles in your notes without altering the original titles. 4. Enhanced note importing with added support for importing from HTML files. 5. Want more granularity in reviewing notes Set review times down to the hour now! Update now for these fresh features!

You can now share notes as image Added Live Text button in Editor Recent Updates: Web Clipper can now work in the background Added Web View for Web Clipped Notes Added Note Template feature. You can pre create templates and insert them into notes.

Web Clipper can now work in the background Added Web View for Web Clipped Notes Added Note Template feature. You can pre create templates and insert them into notes. Recent Updates: You can export notes to Markdown now. By default it s Github flavored Markdown but you can also choose other compatible styles like roam like links. Pinned notes will appear in the sidebar for quick access. Referenced links and tags in notes will reflect changes when modified. Linked References and Unlinked References will highlight all relevant links.

You can export notes to Markdown now. By default it s Github flavored Markdown but you can also choose other compatible styles like roam like links. Pinned notes will appear in the sidebar for quick access. Referenced links and tags in notes will reflect changes when modified. Linked References and Unlinked References will highlight all relevant links. Recent Updates: Added Split View at Note detail page Added Linked References and Unlinked References at Note detail page Added search inside note content Many other small updates.

fixed a potential bug that may cause TabBar hidden inappropriately. RECENT UPDATES: Added Share Extension for iOS which means you can share links or texts in Safari or other apps into Monolog. Be sure to add Monolog in your share list. Added code highlight for Web Clipper. The code snippets from your clipped articles now have better styles. Added Topic Review feature. In addition to scheduled daily reviews you can choose a tag and review notes under this tag at any time. Added Audible Notes feature. You can turn notes into speech add them to a playlist and listen to them while in transit before bed or any time you want. Alternatively you can set a sleep timer and it will automatically stop playing after the scheduled time. Audible notes are available to all notes and note reviews. Added the ability to create notes with corresponding hashtags from tag detail page. Optimized UI for note cards. Fixed some other issues. Optimized Share actions from system extension made sidebar refreshable.

v1.6.0 has two major updates: Added Topic Review feature. In addition to scheduled daily reviews you can choose a tag and review notes under this tag at any time. Added Audible Notes feature. You can turn notes into speech add them to a playlist and listen to them while in transit before bed or any time you want. Alternatively you can set a sleep timer and it will automatically stop playing after the scheduled time. Audible notes are available to all notes and note reviews.

v1.5.3 is a minor update with the following fixes: Optimized error reporting on iCloud sync issues. Note detail page will re layout after note is edited. Added a page for untagged notes. RECENT UPDATES: Adds Recently Deleted section where previously deleted notes could be restored or permanently deleted. Adds export ability to txt rtfd and html formats. Adds auto export ability for premium users that exports a note to iCloud Drive every time it s saved. Adds iCloud Sync indicator for premium users that displays synchronization progress and errors. User nickname and avatar are now able to sync through iCloud. Optimized download logic for attachments stored in iCloud Drive. Images pasted into editor can now be correctly resized. Allows magnification and drag in Image Preview. Optimized side menu UI.

This is a minor update containing a few bug fixes. RECENT UPDATES: Adds Recently Deleted section where previously deleted notes could be restored or permanently deleted. Adds export ability to txt rtfd and html formats. Adds auto export ability for premium users that exports a note to iCloud Drive every time it s saved. Adds iCloud Sync indicator for premium users that displays synchronization progress and errors. User nickname and avatar are now able to sync through iCloud. Optimized download logic for attachments stored in iCloud Drive. Images pasted into editor can now be correctly resized. Allows magnification and drag in Image Preview. Optimized side menu UI.

Optimized for note assets storage. Notes with attachments now take less disk space and sync is faster. For new users this new storage method is provided by default. For old users an optimization option is provided for free. Export ability into txt files for all existing notes is also available during the optimization. More export options is coming in future releases. Provided new options for the web clipper. a few other fixes.

This update fixed a bug related to note editing. RECENT UPDATE: Newly designed note editor combining note taking and web clipping pages. Will detect http link and present web clipper when the app enters foreground Fixed a few bugs when clipping certain sites Added Cancel button when clipping a web page Fixed the bug when switching between portrait mode and landscape mode
